display: This workspace is a public project to write a novel with input from J Wynia's social media community via LLM agent. It does not yet have a context network initialized and needs one. Details on that pattern are in @inbox/context-network-guide.md. The README has a tiny blurb in it about how this project came to be. For now, I just want to initialize a context network with information already provided. We'll expand from there.
The @CLAUDE.md file should also contain proper instructions for bootstrapping context as detailed in @inbox/context-network-prompt.md
